name: Ghost Story Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Ghost Story Escape

Description:   In this game, you need to use your detective skill to solve the mysterious murder case and find a way out from the ghost apartment. Good luck and have fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/ghost-story-escape/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
